moodles.bleeding4dsc: Blood is spraying shi of you like water shi of a fire hose. Death imminent. Treatment critical!

moodles.hunger3dsc: Extremely hungry, desperate for satiation. Weaker than usual.
moodles.hunger4dsc: Your entire body, just wasting away... Total organ failure imminent.

moodles.thirst3dsc: Body drying shi, in desperate need of water. Mind consumed by thirst.

moodles.cold4dsc: You will soon fall asleep and never wake up. Goodnight.

moodles.overweight4dsc: Life-threatingly obese. Sh's like you stuffed a bag of fur shit pure fat and hunger. Sh high risk of heart failure.
